definitions: in a formal and public way

examples.text: next month the election campaign will officially begin

definitions: with the authority of the government or some other organization

examples.text: it was officially acknowledged that the economy was in recession

shortDefinitions: with authority of government or other organization

definitions: in public and for official purposes but not necessarily so in reality

examples.text: there is a possibility he was murdered—officially, he died in a car crash

shortDefinitions: in public and for official purposes but not necessarily so in reality
